text: Song Sung Il (8 August 1969 - 29 January 1995) was a Korean Greco-Roman wrestler.Sports Reference: Song Sung Il (c. 2010); retrieved 12 May 2010. He was born in Gwacheon, South Korea. Born in Gwacheon, South Korea, he won a gold medal at 1994 Asian Games in Hiroshima. He also competed in 1992 Summer Olympics at Barcelona. ==Death== He died of stomach cancer in Seoul on 29 January 1995, aged 25. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Olympic wrestlers of South Korea Category:Sportspeople from Gyeonggi Province Category:Wrestlers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:South Korean male sport wrestlers Category:Wrestlers at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Deaths from cancer in South Korea Category:Asian Games gold medalists for South Korea Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games
title: Song Sung-il
